problem_text:
Suppose that H is an almost simple group of Lie type and G is a finite group such that G and H have the same sets of degrees of irreducible complex characters. Must there exist an abelian normal subgroup A of G such that G/A is isomorphic to H?
Comment of 2025: The conjecture was confirmed for projective general linear and unitary groups of dimension 3 (F. Shirjian, A. Iranmanesh, Illinois J. Math., 64, no. 1 (2020), 49–69).
A. Iranmanesh
